turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a Cafe Latte from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You would like to order a Cafe Latte from Starbucks? Which nearby location would you like, 350 Palladio Parkway, 110 East Bidwell, or 51 Riley Street in Folsom? If none of these are the location you are looking for, say "new location" and specify city or street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the store at 350 Palladio Parkway

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, the wait time at this location is approximately five to seven minutes, is this okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, you wanted a Cafe Latte? What Size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any customizations to this beverage?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can I get it with whole milk please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, any other customizations?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, three pumps of sugar free vanilla and extra whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I have a Grande Cafe Latte with whole milk and three pumps of sugar free vanilla, is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can I also have it extra hot please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, a Grande Cafe Latte with whole milk, three pumps of sugar free vanilla, and extra hot.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am placing your order at 350 Palladio Parkway and should be ready in about five to seven minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you again!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order receipt will be sent to your mobile phone via text message. Is there anything else I can do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you, enjoy your order at Starbucks.
